Test.name: Basic persistent delivery
Test.WhatTest: Tests the basic feature of the JADE Persistent Delivery service, i.e. the capability of storing certain messages whose intented receiver does not exist and delivering them as soon as the receiver starts.

Test.name: Timeout
Test.WhatTest: Tests the case of a message that is stored for a limited amount of time.

Test.name: Store on file
Test.WhatTest: Tests the case where the Persistent Delivery servivce stores messages on the file system.
